Moderate Use of Nut Foods 

                                            Letter 73, 1899 


     16. We eat no meat or butter, and use very little milk in cooking. There is no fresh fruit at this season. We have a good yield of tomatoes, but our family think much of the nuts prepared in a variety of ways. We use one fifth as much as the recipe specifies. 
     [TOMATOES ESPECIALLY GOOD--523]
